Contradict fact: The claim falsely attributes a quote to President Donald Trump, contradicting the fact that he never said it.
Lack enough support: There is no evidence or record of President Trump ever making the quoted statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump made the statement without any basis or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The quote is actually attributed to author Ernest Hemingway, indicating that someone else said it, not President Trump.
